org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement

Class BlockInfoContiguousUnderConstruction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.Block
      • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.BlockInfoContiguous
        • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.BlockInfoContiguousUnderConstruction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.Block>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.util.LightWeightGSet.LinkedElement

    public class BlockInfoContiguousUnderConstruction
extends org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.BlockInfoContiguous
    Represents a block that is currently being constructed.
    This is usually the last block of a file opened for write or append.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.server.blockmanagement.BlockInfoContiguous
